summary: An aspiring actress gets a housesitting job and finds herself in a cat-and-mouse game with a deadly ex-con.
cast: Michael Madsen|Helen Slater|Jeffrey Tambor|James Laurenson|Elyssa Davalos|Taylor Lee|Toni Barry|James Noellenhoff|Margaret Parke|Larue M. Mall|Vincent Eaton|Sally Daykin|Pieter Riemens|Brenda Colom|Ron La Paz|Ken Wiederhorn|Rhoderic Bannatyne|Fernando Goezman|John Blyth Barrymore
title: La casa de la colina
